Row.Text: Becomes Suzerain of all previously encountered City-States when founding a Pantheon or circumnavigating the globe, and grant +3 [ICON_Envoy] Envoys to already Suzerained City-States. Each type of City-State you are Suzerain of provides +1 [ICON_Movement] Movement to all units. When killing a unit, if you are Suzerain of multiple City-States of the same type, your Capital gains +1 corresponding yield. Gain one [ICON_Envoy] Envoy when clearing a Barbarian Camp or exploring a Goody Hut.

A unique unit for Tomoe Udagawa that replaces the Builder. Has lower base cost and higher [ICON_Movement] Movement, and ignores Zone of Control. After using a [ICON_Charges] charge, has a chance to generate a Goody Hut on an unowned tile within 6 tiles.
